did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Mattachine Society of New York printed miscellany, circa 1967.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Survey on "Social Psychology of Homosexuality," pamphlet "V.D. Information for Homosexuals," outgoing form letters of the Society, publicity, and a flyer "The Mattachine Society Likes Girls Too!"

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Survey on "Social Psychology of Homosexuality," pamphlet "V.D. Information for Homosexuals," outgoing form letters of the Society, publicity, and a flyer "The Mattachine Society Likes Girls Too!"
